name: Sci-Ber Wars: Tactics
description:
Sci-Ber Wars: Tactics is a player versus player hotseat game designed and developed a final year project in game design.

Made using object oriented programming allows for smooth running game on most PC builds and it provides a friendly competitive experience. 

Key Features:

3 races to choose from each with 5 different classes of units.

Create your own custom maps and play on them.

Fully adjustable sounds for all elements.

Fully voice acted (by students).
